title: Signal (software)
summary: Signal is a cross-platform centralized encrypted instant messaging service developed by the non-profit Signal Technology Foundation and Signal Messenger LLC. Users can send one-to-one and group messages, which can include files, voice notes, images and videos.[15] It can also be used to make one-to-one and group voice and video calls,[16][17] and the Android version can optionally function as an SMS app.[18]
